articles.title: This Clever Mop Is 77% Off, Plus 6 More Mop Deals at Amazon
articles.author: Toni Sutton

The Shark S1000 Steam Mop eliminates 99.9% of bacteria with steam, while the Cldream Spray Mop utilizes a 360-degree swivel head and washable pads. Other options include the O-Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop, Achtfach 6-in-1 Steam Mop, Eous Cordless Electric Mop, and Bomidi Spin Mop Set.

articles.title: Alexa+ early adopter gives their thoughts: "Old Alexa was hot garbage but this new one was a pleasant surprise"
articles.author: Cat Ellis
articles.summary: Amazon's new AI-enhanced voice assistant, Alexa+, is being tested by early adopters like Reddit user Pretty2be. Initial reports suggest improved performance in smart home device control, natural speech interpretation, and speech synthesis compared to the previous Alexa version. While there are some quirks like pushing Amazon Music over Spotify, the overall experience is positive, with Pretty2be indicating a willingness to purchase the device.

College roommates-turned-entrepreneurs created it and it became the No. 1 bestselling shoe cleaner on Amazon. User reviews highlight the product's effectiveness in removing dirt and stains from shoes.

articles.title: Dyson's floor cleaner is impressive â€“ but don't make the mistake I made with it

The device separates dry dirt from dirty water in real time and includes a self-cleaning mode, targeting users who appreciate tech-based cleaning and control over the cleaning process.

articles.title: Adobe and Figma tools are getting ChatGPT's upgraded image generation model
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching its upgraded image generator API, 'gpt-image-1,' which offers advanced image generation capabilities. Companies like Adobe (Firefly and Express) and Figma are already integrating the model into their platforms, enabling users to generate and edit images with simple prompts and experiment with different styles. Other companies such as Canva, GoDaddy, and Instacart are also exploring ways to utilize the new image generation API.

articles.summary: Siyuan Ma, a Senior UX Designer at Amazon Alexa, worked on Amazon Alexa+, an evolution of the digital assistant powered by generative AI. Designing for users who didn't yet exist required Ma and his team to dig deep, invent frameworks, and challenge assumptions.

These solutions include new AI Starter Kits for the Lenovo Hybrid AI Platform and the industry's first liquid-cooled hyperconverged infrastructure (HCI) appliance. The new portfolio is intended to enhance performance, efficiency, and scalability for AI workloads.

articles.title: 'New Coke': 40 years since one of the biggest flops in marketing history
articles.author: Catherine Stoddard
articles.summary: In 1985, Coca-Cola introduced "new Coke", a reformulated version of its classic soda, aiming to compete with Pepsi's sweeter taste. Despite initial focus group approval and significant marketing investment, the product was met with strong consumer backlash. Eventually the company reintroduced the original formula as "Coca-Cola Classic" and rebranded "new Coke" as Coke II, before discontinuing it.

articles.title: Grok Leaps Forward Rivaling ChatGPT, Gemini with New Real-Time Vision
articles.author: Zacharias Wuragil

These updates are currently exclusive to iOS devices, with Android users able to access them through a SuperGrok subscription. Additionally, xAI has introduced a tool for creating documents and apps and a memory feature for Grok.

Klarna used AI to generate and test over 1,000 ad image variations, reducing image production time and saving $6 million. AI-powered systems also enable real-time campaign optimization by adjusting budgets, bidding strategies, targeting, and creative elements based on performance data.

These earbuds feature 11mm+6mm drivers, LHDC 5.0, 53dB noise cancellation, IP55 rating, Bluetooth 5.4, Dual Pairing 2.0, 3D Spatial Audio, 45ms low latency, and offer 48 hours of playback time with the 530mAh case and 62mAh buds batteries.

The G700 features a CDM-O plug-in hybrid platform producing 750hp and 795Nm of torque, with an expected driving range of 1,400-1,500km. Its exterior design aims to compete with the Mercedes-Benz G-Class and Land Rover Defender.

The Power Pocket Puff also helps to re-blend product and reduce surface oil for a freshly applied look and can be used with powder bronzers and blush for contouring.

It is available for purchase on Bulldog Skincare's website.

articles.title: Gyerim, a company specializing in bathroom products, announced on the 23rd that it has launched thre..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
articles.summary: Gyerim, a bathroom product company, has launched three types of 'cleanjet multipurpose showerheads' featuring both shower and cleaning functions. The high-end models support multiple injection modes like rain, mist, mixing, and general cleaning, with features like high-pressure cleaning mode and dense nozzles for wide spraying. These showerheads are available at the official Gyelimbas shopping mall and dealerships nationwide.

articles.title: Generative AI Perfects the Craft of Scent Creation
articles.author: SCIENMAG
articles.summary: The Institute of Science Tokyo has introduced OGDiffusion, an AI model that automates the creation of new fragrances based on user-defined scent descriptors. This innovation streamlines fragrance design by generating unique essential oil blends and represents a significant advancement in aroma design by creating new fragrance profiles eliminating human intervention.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI introduces vision capabilities in Grok chatbot: How the vision feature works and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: xAI has launched 'Grok Vision', an update to its Grok chatbot, enabling it to process and interpret visual inputs using advanced computer vision technology. Furthermore, xAI recently rolled out a memory feature for Grok, allowing it to remember details from past conversations and provide more personalized responses.

articles.title: Grok Vision unveiled: Elon Musk's AI â€˜sees' the world through your camera
articles.summary: xAI has launched Grok Vision, a new feature for its Grok chatbot that enables it to 'see' the world using a smartphone's camera. The feature allows users to point their phone at items to receive instant explanations and context. Grok Vision is available on iOS and requires a SuperGrok subscription for Android users, and launches alongside new voice and memory features.

articles.title: Meet the skincare tool to help curate your bespoke skincare routine
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Noli, an AI-powered skincare service, has launched to provide personalized beauty product recommendations. The service utilizes face scans and questionnaires to create a 'Beauty DNA' profile, suggesting products tailored to individual skin types and concerns. New customers can receive a 20% discount on their first order with the code 'WELCOME20'.

articles.title: Skin Goals Start Here: Best Face Washes You Can Buy Online
articles.summary: CeraVe SA Smoothing Cleanser is presented as an exfoliating and smoothing solution for rough, dry skin. DOT & KEY Barrier Repair + Hydrating Face Wash is recommended for individuals experiencing tightness and dryness after cleansing. Simple Kind To Skin Refreshing Face Wash is positioned as a reliable everyday cleanser, and Plum Simply Bright 2% Niacinamide Face Wash is highlighted as suitable for acne-prone, oily, or sensitive skin.

articles.title: AI Innovates in Scent Design
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Institute of Science Tokyo (Science Tokyo) has developed and launched an AI model named Odor Generative Diffusion (OGDiffusion) which automates the creation of new fragrances based on user-defined scent descriptors. This AI model utilizes generative diffusion networks, informed by existing data, and analyzes chemical profiles of essential oils to generate new fragrance profiles. Human sensory tests have validated that the AI-generated fragrances align with the intended scent profiles.

articles.title: Baidu launches AI agent Xinxiang for Android platform, iOS version under review
articles.author: Che Pan
articles.summary: Baidu launched Xinxiang, an AI agent capable of handling tasks like information analysis and travel planning. This AI agent is currently available on Android smartphones, with an iOS version pending review.

articles.title: Get the Microsoft Surface SE laptop for only $190
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: Microsoft is offering an open-box Microsoft Surface SE Laptop for $189.99. This 11.6-inch laptop features Windows 11 SE, an Intel Celeron N4120 processor, 8GB RAM, and a 128GB SSD, targeting students and users needing a portable device for everyday tasks like emails and streaming.

articles.title: Best Dyson deal: Save $100 on Dyson V11 Origin cordless vacuum
articles.author: Christian Wait
articles.summary: Dyson V11 Origin cordless vacuum is available for $469.99 at Amazon, a $100 discount off its regular price. This cordless vacuum offers up to 60 minutes of run time and 60% more power than earlier Dyson models.

articles.title: Baidu's Xinxiang: Revolutionizing AI Task Management
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Baidu has launched a new AI agent, Xinxiang, designed to enhance task management efficiency. Xinxiang offers capabilities such as information analysis and travel planning. Currently, it is available on Android devices with an iOS launch pending.

articles.title: Noxtua raises $92M for its sovereign AI tuned for the German legal system
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Xayn, a privacy-based AI startup, has rebranded as Noxtua and secured $92.2 million in Series B funding. This pivot marks the company's shift towards developing sovereign AI solutions specifically for the legal industry.

articles.title: Asda launches 'chip shop curry' pizza with internet influencer
articles.author: Michael Ribbeck
articles.summary: Asda has launched a new product, the 'Chip Shop Curry Pizza,' in collaboration with Destiny Harold. The 12-inch pizza is topped with chips, chicken pieces, and curry sauce and is available exclusively at Asda's pizza counters for a limited time.

articles.title: Transpennine Express launches new First Class menu
articles.author: Saiqa Chaudhari
articles.summary: TransPennine Express (TPE) has launched a new spring/summer menu for First Class customers, featuring Lancaster Supernova, a zesty Pale Ale created exclusively for TPE by Lancaster Brewery, and a chorizo sausage roll made in partnership with Pie Demand. The new menu also includes dishes like Scottish smoked salmon penne pasta, chicken and leek pie, harissa vegetable stew, and Belgian waffles, along with a new First Class wine selection from The Copper Crew.

articles.title: 'Gorgeous' Â£14 Primark dress comes in two 'pretty spring colours'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Primark introduced its Square Neck Strappy Mini Dress priced at Â£14 in spring-ready colors like lemon yellow and soft pink, along with black. Primark also offers a Â£14 Tiered Mini Smock Dress available in blue, lemon or black and a Â£23 Sleeveless Corset Mini Dress with pink, white and floral options available.

articles.title: Cheeky, stylish Suzuki Swift selling like hot cakes for a reason
articles.author: Sihle Mlambo
articles.summary: Suzuki Swift is one of the fastest selling vehicles in South Africa due to its affordability and fuel efficiency. The Suzuki Swift models are priced from R219,900 to R284,900, including a service plan and promotional warranty.

articles.title: T-Mobile Adds New Plans With More Hotspot Data
articles.author: Juli Clover
articles.summary: T-Mobile is replacing its Go5G Plus and Go5G Next plans with Experience More and Experience Beyond. Experience More includes 60 GB of hotspot data and satellite connectivity and costs $85 for a single line. Experience Beyond is T-Mobile's highest-end plan.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI introduces vision capabilities in Grok chatbot: How the vision feature works and more
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: xAI has launched an update to its Grok chatbot, introducing Grok Vision for image analysis, multilingual audio, and real-time search in Voice Mode.  A memory feature, similar to those found in ChatGPT and Google's Gemini, was also recently introduced, allowing Grok to provide more personalized responses. The features are currently in beta and available on Grok.com and the Grok iOS and Android apps, but is not yet accessible in the EU or UK.

articles.title: Crushon AI: Unlimited AI Sex Chat and NSFW AI Now Free for All Users
articles.author: CRUSHON AI CORP
articles.summary: Crushon.AI launched major updates to its NSFW AI companion platform. These updates include the removal of usage restrictions on several leading-performing AI models, providing broader, unrestricted access for users seeking richer Spicy AI and AI Sex Chat experiences.

articles.title: Leveraging opportunities in AI for building sustainable brands
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: AI tools can predict the environmental impact of materials and come up with new design ideas for sustainable product development. AI enables smarter logistics, ethical sourcing, and personalized communication about product's sourcing and carbon footprint. These AI applications help companies reduce emissions and improve sustainability performance.

articles.title: Cousins Maine Lobster Driving Growth Across Oklahoma, Announcing New Truck Opening in Oklahoma City, OK
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Cousins Maine Lobster (CML) launched its 85th food truck unit in Oklahoma City on its 13th anniversary. The launch coincides with the Oklahoma City Memorial Marathon weekend.

articles.title: Pre-order the vivo V50 Lite until April 25 to enjoy exclusive perks
articles.summary: Vivo has launched the V50 Lite smartphone, featuring a 6500mAh battery with 90W FlashCharge, a 50MP Sony camera, and a 120Hz AMOLED display. The phone also boasts IP65 dust and water resistance and SGS five-star drop resistance. Pre-orders are available until April 25th with exclusive perks at vivo stores nationwide.

articles.title: Make Friends in Canton Fairä¸¨Millie made friends with Pun, a Gen-Z entrepreneur from Thailand
articles.author: Alice Fung
articles.summary: Pun, a Gen-Z entrepreneur, discovered AI massage robots at the Canton Fair. She intends to bring these robots to Thailand, potentially launching them as a new product in the Thai market through her China-Thailand trading company.

articles.title: Be careful out there. Don't Buy Stuff from Old AI People
articles.author: Scary
articles.summary: Grace Bags and Henry's Watches are companies utilizing AI to create advertisements. The content warns against buying products from these brands.

articles.title: Ford Goes Even More Premium With Super Duty Platinum Plus Pickups
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Ford is introducing the Platinum Plus package, a new luxurious variant for its full-size trucks. The package includes exclusive customer experience perks.

articles.title: ColourPop's Disney â€˜Tangled' collection drops soon and this makeup sparkles just like blondie's glowing locks
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: ColourPop is launching a new princess-inspired product. This launch is aimed at customers who use makeup and hair products as part of their morning routine.

articles.title: New Tata Altroz CNG Facelift Spied Testing, Launching When? Check Details
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Tata Altroz is preparing to launch or unveil the Altroz CNG version. Spy shots of the Altroz CNG version have appeared on the internet. This indicates that Tata aims to expand the fleet with more options.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Confirms Yet Another Launch Title
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Sega is launching Sonic X Shadow Generations as a launch title for the Nintendo Switch 2. The game's debut will coincide with the release of the new console.

articles.title: 27 Top Spring 2025 Hair Product Launches
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The content highlights a selection of 'best new hair products,' including pocket-sized brushes, air dry creams for texture enhancement, shine enhancers, and essential shower staples. These items represent recent additions to the hair care market.

articles.title: SK hynix Completes Customer Validation of CXL 2.0-based DDR5
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: A company completed customer qualification for its 96GB product. This product aims to help customers reduce costs.

articles.title: These 7 Nintendo Switch 2 pre-order tips helped me secure my own bundle, and they ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nintendo is preparing for the launch of the Nintendo Switch 2.  Pre-orders are currently available, and the company anticipates high demand.

articles.title: Taco Bell is bringing chicken nuggets back: Here's when you can get them
articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: Yum Brands is deploying artificial intelligence at hundreds of Taco Bell drive-thru locations in the U.S. Taco Bell has also reintroduced Cheddar Chicken nuggets to its menu.

articles.title: iRobot's latest Roomba robot vacuum is great news for pet owners
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: iRobot launched its ninth robot vacuum of the year, the latest Roomba. This new Roomba features pet waste avoidance capabilities and dual rubber roller brushes to remove pet hair from carpets.

articles.title: Why Samsung's Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE Will Change The Market
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to launch a Galaxy Z Flip 7 Fan Edition (FE), a lower-priced foldable phone, expected to use technology from the Galaxy Z Flip 6 with concessions made to reduce the cost. This new product aims to broaden Samsung's market share by attracting price-conscious consumers with the allure of foldable technology, potentially launching around the same time as the Galaxy S25 FE.

articles.title: Cloud-First Computing, How Real Are Virtual Desktops?
articles.author: Adrian Bridgwater
articles.summary: Nerdio launched Nerdio Manager for Enterprise 7.0, an updated end-user computing management platform designed to manage Windows 365 and Azure Virtual Desktop, with features for planning, migration, automation, and cost optimization. The platform also integrates with Microsoft Intune and offers updated pricing options to provide cost predictability and flexibility for enterprises.

articles.title: Chinese EV makers take spotlight as Tesla skips Shanghai Auto Show for third time
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: BYD, Nio, Geely, Xiaomi, and Leapmotor will showcase both new and existing car models at a two-week event commencing on Wednesday. This indicates the unveiling or promotion of their product lines.

articles.title: BYD unveils new luxury sports car as carmakers vie for attention at China's largest auto show
articles.author: Simone McCarthy
articles.summary: BYD's premium Denza line unveiled the Z, a new, tech and luxury focused, deep-blue luxury sports car.
